Title: Wrong Side Raju
Writer: Niren Bhatt, Niren Bhatt (story), Niren Bhatt, Mikhil Musale, Karan Vyas, Karan Vyas
Actors: Kimberley Louisa McBeath, Asif Basra, Kavi Shastri, Hetal Puniwala
Plot: A driver named Raju embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing lives of 3 people due to a controversial hit and run accident.
